briefTitle: A Phase III Study of TMC435 in Genotype 1, Hepatitis C-infected Participants Who Failed to Respond to Previous IFN-based Therapy
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Open-label, Two-arm Trial in Japan to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of TMC435 as Part of a Treatment Regimen Including Peginterferon Alfa-2a and Ribavirin in Hepatitis C, Genotype 1-Infected Subjects Who Failed to Respond to Previous IFN-based Therapy
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of TMC435 in combination with peginterferon alfa-2a (PegIFNα-2a) and ribavirin in genotype 1 hepatitis C virus (HCV)-infected participants who failed to respond to previous interferon (IFN)-based therapy in Japan.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants With a Sustained Virologic Response at the End of Treatment (EOT) and 12 Weeks After the Last Dose of Treatment (SVR12)
